word:
Chapter 6 

     1-7 (Revelation 11:19). Isaiah's Experience Represents Last-Day Church.--[Isaiah 6:1-4 quoted.] As the prophet Isaiah beheld the 
                                                                           1139
glory of the Lord, he was amazed, and, overwhelmed with a sense of his own weakness and unworthiness, he cried, "Woe is me! for I am undone; because I am a man of unclean lips, and I dwell in the midst of a people of unclean lips: for mine eyes have seen the King, the Lord of Hosts."
